FacilityName: Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City Further Processing

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City stores and uses ammonia, which is regulated by EPA's Risk Management Program.

Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City believes that the ammonia we store and handle on site has very real and potential dangers.   However, it is important to keep the risks in perspective.  Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City's chemical storage and handling facilities:
1.  are properly designed
2.  have effective operation and maintenance procedures
3.  employ trained operators and technicians
4.  periodically conduct safety audits, and
5.  are constantly upgrading its processes to meet or exceed industry standards

Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City also has taken a proactive approach towards coordinating emergency efforts with the Bossier City Fire Department.  The Bossier City E.M.A. has a copy of our emergency response program and is well trained and prepared to respond to the potential spills and leaks that may occur at the Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City facility.  The Bossier City Fire Department conducts annual site visits to our facility.  There have been no reprotable releases of ammonia at Wayne Farms LLC-Bossier City in the past 5 years.

A facility which maintains high standards, such as Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City provides less public risk than a facility that does not provide safe operations.  Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City complies with Federal OSHA rules and guidelines for safe handling, storage and operation of chemical systems.  We also utilize outside experts to periodically inspect our systems integrity, train system operators and upgrade systems to improve safety.

Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City used EPA's OCA Guidance for off-site consequence analysis of ammonia.

CONCLUSION
Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City believes that the poultry industry should proactively inform the public of the potential dangers and the actions that Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City has taken to minimize these dangers.  Wayne Farms LLC - Bossier City has a long-great ongoing rela
tionship with the community.  We encourage any and all citizens who have concerns or questions to contact our facility.  We look forward to continuing our relationship in Bossier Parish.
